General.Name: Tivoli A/S
General.Description: Tivoli A/S engages in the entertainment business in Denmark. It operates and maintains gardens. The company offers rides, games, shows, events, and concerts. It also operates 36 restaurants; Nimb Hotel, a 5-star boutique hotel with 38 rooms; and Nimb Club with fitness, pool, and spa, as well as 12 restaurants and outlets under the Nimb brand. In addition, the company leases stalls, shops, restaurants, and Tivoli food hall. Tivoli A/S was founded in 1843 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

8.Name: Niels Erik Folmann
8.Title: Sr. VP, Commercial Director & Chief Commercial Officer
